Articles.Content:
False still need to download.

the user below me thinks WOT is not pay-to-win.

Didn't play much, so no reply at this moment.

The next poster hates pay-to-win.

You bet I do. Bluh bluh.

I'm super wary of any multiplayer game that offers expansions for real money; usually all that means is that rich people (and 'hackers' aka people who know how to circumvent paying for IAPs) can always be more effective at the game than you. There comes a point where it stops being a game and starts being a p- </rant>

The user below me is currently wearing glow-in-the-dark nail polish.

Nooooo.

The user below me wonders why we paint our nails.

True.

Nope,

Kerbin would be gone in 2 days

True. My computer likely couldn't handle it.

False. Have only seen the first one with my kids, I enjoyed it.
